synopsis.text:
Sensen's relentless crusade against the divine continues in this thrilling anime, with their cunning leader, Yuri Nakamura, devising a masterful plan to break free from the clutches of the afterlife. Dubbed 'Operation High Tension Syndrome', Yuri's subordinates are tasked with executing a deceptive scheme to outwit Kanade Tachibana, the enigmatic student council president rumored to be in league with God. By feigning readiness to move on, the SSS members hope to dupe Kanade and secure their escape to Heaven. With a week's sustenance at stake and the ultimate reward of paradise on the horizon, can the SSS members successfully deceive the elusive Kanade?

Unseen adventures of Angel Beats! await in the unaired episodes, featured in the seventh volume of the Blu-ray and DVD, as well as the Blu-ray Box. In 'Stairway to Heaven Operation High Tension Syndrome', Yuri orchestrates yet another ploy, this time with the sole intention of encountering God. Meanwhile, 'Hell's Kitchen' presents an additional, unaired episode of Angel Beats!, included exclusively in the Blu-ray Box.  Dive into these special episodes for even more action, intrigue, and otherworldly excitement!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
